items.name: Foe Hold
explicitMods: Adds 5 to 12 Cold Damage to Attacks

items.name: Anathema
explicitMods: 10% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

items.name: Starlight Chalice
explicitMods: Inflict Fire, Cold and Lightning Exposure on nearby Enemies when used
29% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments you inflict during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Uhtred and his priests drank of the skies
to empower runes... and themselves.

items.name: Star of Wraeclast
explicitMods: 60% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
You cannot be Cursed with Silence
flavourText: "I offer to you an eternal oath
that binds your heart to mine;
a bond that not even death will break.
Will you accept?"
- Daresso, to his beloved

items.name: White Wind
explicitMods: 112% increased Cold Damage while your Off Hand is empty
+31% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while your Off Hand is empty
flavourText: The Maraketh fear very little,
but they dare not whisper the name
of the demon that flies on Winter's gales.

items.typeLine: Enduring Divine Mana Flask of the Pupil
explicitMods:
Effect is not removed when Unreserved Mana is Filled
Effect does not Queue
14% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Bated Breath
flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

items.typeLine: Apprentice's Sapphire Flask of the Impala
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Analyst's Granite Flask of the Mockingbird
explicitMods: 47% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: The Consuming Dark
explicitMods: +1 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems
30% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Your Chaos Damage has 60% chance to Poison Enemies
flavourText: The brightest flames cast the darkest shadows.

items.name: Eye of Malice
explicitMods: 25% chance to inflict Cold Exposure on Hit
25% chance to inflict Fire Exposure on Hit
Nearby Enemies have 50% increased Fire and Cold Resistances
flavourText: Through vision coloured by burning rage and icy hate
peers a visitor from a realm of ill intent...

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 217 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 25% more Physical Damage
Supported Skills deal no Chaos Damage
Supported Skills deal no Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Windscream
explicitMods: You can apply an additional Curse
50% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
flavourText: The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which makes nearby allies inflict impale with attacks, and lessens the accuracy of nearby enemies. Gain stages by impaling enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 20% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
You and nearby Allies have 19% increased Impale Effect
Nearby Enemies have 21% less Accuracy Rating
Gain 1 Stage when you Impale an Enemy while carrying the Banner, up to 5 per second
Gain +10 to maximum Fortification for 0.05 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the user and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction based on your endurance charges.
explicitMods: Counts total Power of Enemies in Range
Buff grants 2% additional Physical Damage Reduction per Endurance Charge
Buff grants +2% to all Elemental Resistances per Endurance Charge
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds fire damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 109 to 155 additional Fire Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 109 to 155 additional Fire Damage with Spells
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills Deal 59% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

explicitMods: Can have up to 5 Implicit Modifiers while Item has this Modifier

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. life passes quickly.
